'''Ubuntu 8.04 Release Party'''
 
That's right our second release party and our first as a official Ubuntu LoCo.<<BR>>
Where: Flying Star Acequia De Corrales 10700 Corrales Road<<BR>>
When: Friday 4/25/08 at 6:30pm till 9:00pm click<nowiki>[[http://www.flyingstarcafe.com/LocCorrales.htm|here]]</nowiki> for directions.<<BR>>
Check out the place <nowiki>[[http://www.flyingstarcafe.com/CorralesLarge.htm|here]]</nowiki><<BR>>
This year we are doing it in style and have a <nowiki>[[http://www.flyingstarcafe.com/hospitality.htm|room]]</nowiki> reserved, if you would like to contribute to the room rent please contact <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/GrammatonCleric|Eric Krieger]]</nowiki> and let him know. And thanks to Eric for getting this all organized.

'''4/25/2008 The Night of the New Mexico LoCo Hardy Heron Release Party'''

The New Mexico Ubuntu LoCo would like to thank everyone that joined us for the release of Ubuntu 8.04. We would also like to thank all the New Mexico LoCo members that helped with the party. Members donated money (We owe you big time Eric), time, and supplies and those people just rock!
